titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Dimethyl Disulfide (DMDS).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/3/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2009, the duty on Dimethyl Disulfide (DMDS).
